name: Misery (Birskins)
description:
INTRODUCTION

You're within a dream that feels too real within environments that you do not recognise, how has this happened and what are you doing here? your only way out is to move forward and find out.   

Within this game you must explore the environments presented to you and deal with whatever forces you face along the way, dangers encountered will have their own way of being dealt with and that will be up to you the player to figure out, you will get through this!

BEFORE PLAYING!

It is important to understand that this game may not be suitable for everyone as it tackles some sensitive topics about mental health, but also it also may be important to experience this as during the production I was able to understand that we truly are not alone and can help one another, we can get through everything by being together.

HOW TO PLAY

Traverse through the environment as you please to proceed further and explore more about the world you are in. Encounter something you've never been able to see before and figure your own way out on how to deal with it to make sure you can get out.

CONTROLS

A & D To move Left and Right

Space Bar to jump and 2x Jump

Use mouse to select options

HOW TO INSTALL

1. Download the ZIP file.  2. Extract all the files from the ZIP file. 3. Launch the Samurai!

DISCLAIMERS!!! This is a university Project, the module focuses on Level Design and story telling so any Feedback would be much appreciated!
